@timestamp.description: Timestamp holds the recorded time of the event, UTC based and formatted as microseconds since Unix epoch

dataset.description: Dataset identifies the source which originated the log line.

error.message.description: ErrorMessage represents the message contained in the error if the log line represents an error.

error.stack_trace.description: ErrorStacktrace represents the plain text stacktrace of the error the log line represents.

error.type.description: ErrorType represents the type of the error if the log line represents an error.

faas.description: FAAS holds fields related to Function as a Service events.

coldstart.description: Indicates whether a function invocation was a cold start or not.

execution.description: The request id of the function invocation.

id.description: A unique identifier of the invoked serverless function.

request_id.description: The id of the origin trigger request.

labels.description: Labels are a flat mapping of user-defined key-value pairs.

log.level.description: Level represents the severity of the recorded log.

log.logger.description: Logger represents the name of the used logger instance.

log.origin.file.line.description: OriginFileLine represents the line number in the file containing the sourcecode where the log originated.

log.origin.file.name.description: OriginFileName represents the filename containing the sourcecode where the log originated.

log.origin.function.description: OriginFunction represents the function name where the log originated.

message.description: Message logged as part of the log. In case a parameterized message is captured, Message should contain the same information, but with any placeholders being replaced.

process.thread.name.description: ProcessThreadName represents the name of the thread.

service.environment.description: ServiceEnvironment represents the environment the service which originated the log line is running in.

service.name.description: ServiceName represents name of the service which originated the log line.

service.node.name.description: ServiceNodeName represents a unique node name per host for the service which originated the log line.

service.version.description: ServiceVersion represents the version of the service which originated the log line.

trace.id.description: TraceID holds the hex encoded 128 random bits ID of the correlated trace.

transaction.id.description: TransactionID holds the hex encoded 64 random bits ID of the correlated transaction.
